      static ContentParser parser

    • Field Detail

      • parser

        public static final ContentParser parser
        This class response for parsing Remedy HTML request content. Parsed content will be upload to Mediawiki. Class use the Jsoup Api for parsing.

    • Method Detail

      • parseCDATA

        public void parseCDATA(java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent)
        The method clear content from CDATA.
        Parameters:
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.

      • replaceUrlImgToMwLocalImg

        public void replaceUrlImgToMwLocalImg(java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.nio.file.Path> requestAttachments,
                                      java.lang.String requestID)
        The method replace image url of KB content with mediawiki syntax link.
        Parameters:
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.
        requestAttachments - The path/filedID pair of Remedy request attachments. Those attachments were downloaded to file system (MainTask.pathContentFiles) by use of Request.setReqAttachments(Entry, String) from Remedy KB request.
        requestID - The Remedy KB requestID of Request.requestID

      • convertBase64ImgToMwLocalImg

        public void convertBase64ImgToMwLocalImg(java.lang.String pathContentFiles,
                                         java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.nio.file.Path> requestAttachments,
                                         java.lang.String articleID,
                                         java.lang.String requestID)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        The method find base64 image of KB request content. Then download to file system (MainTask.pathContentFiles). Then put to Request.requestAttachments and replace base64 image into KB content by mediawiki syntax link. The method find replace base64 image url into content with mediawiki syntax link.
        Parameters:
        pathContentFiles - The path to media files where they will be downloaded.
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.
        requestAttachments - The path/filedID pair of Remedy request attachments. Those attachments were downloaded to file system (MainTask.pathContentFiles) by use of Request.setReqAttachments(Entry, String) from Remedy KB request.
        articleID - The Remedy KB articleID of Request.articleID
        requestID - The Remedy KB requestID of Request.requestID
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The exception would be throw during the download of images.

      • addCategory

        public void addCategory(java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> categories)
        The method add mediawiki category link to content.
        Parameters:
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.
        categories - The categories list of Article.categorization

      • addOriginalPageUrl

        public void addOriginalPageUrl(java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent,
                               java.lang.String originalPage)
        The method add mediawiki category link of KB article original page to content.
        Parameters:
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.
        originalPage - The web url KB remedy article.

      • convertUrlToMwUrl

        public void convertUrlToMwUrl(java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent)
        The method replace any url of KB content with mediawiki syntax link.
        Parameters:
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.

      • addArticleAttach

        public void addArticleAttach(java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent,
                             java.util.Map<java.nio.file.Path,java.lang.String> articleAttachments)
        The method add mediawiki syntax link of article attachments.
        Parameters:
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.
        articleAttachments - The path/fileName pair of Remedy article attachments. Those attachments were downloaded to file system (MainTask.pathContentFiles) by use of Article.setArticleAttachments(Entry, String) from Remedy KB article.

      • clearMicrosoftTag

        public void clearMicrosoftTag(java.lang.StringBuilder parsedContent)
        The method replace Microsoft tags of KB content with html tag span.
        Parameters:
        parsedContent - some html content from Remedy request content.

      • HTML2Mediawiki

        The method replace other html tag unsupported by mediawiki.
        Parameters:
